messages.title: Labour out of the race
messages.content: Labour 100-1 outsiders in Colchester - Ladbrokes. The race to be Colchester’s MP is a straight fight between hard-working Bob Russell and the Conservative candidate from Hertfordshire. Labour and Greens are out of the race and cannot win here.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour 100-1 outsiders in Colchester - Ladbrokes. The race to be Colchester’s MP is a straight fight between hard-working Bob Russell and the Conservative candidate from Hertfordshire. Labour and Greens are out of the race and cannot win here.

quotes.text: It’s so close here Voting Labour or Green just helps the Conservatives here. Our next MP will be local champion Bob Russell and no other result is possible.

images.caption: Bar chart showing Lib Dem 47%, Con 33%, Lab 20% with text 'It’s so close here Voting Labour or Green just helps the Conservatives here. Our next MP will be local champion Bob Russell and no other result is possible.'

leaflet.additionalNotes: Figures from the 2005 General Election result in Colchester indicate Lib Dem 47%, Con 33%, Lab 20%.
